verses.text: Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon a \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, if the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of their \w coasts|strong="H7097"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* him for their \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w*:\f + \fr 33.2 \ft When…: Heb. A land when I bring a sword upon her\f*

If when he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, he \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

Then \w whosoever|strong="H8085"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and taketh not \w warning|strong="H2094"\w*; if the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and take him \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 33.4 \ft whosoever…: Heb. he that hearing heareth\f*

He \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and took not \w warning|strong="H2094"\w*; his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be upon him. But he that taketh \w warning|strong="H2094"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

But if the \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* not the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* be not \w warned|strong="H2094"\w*; if the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add any\add* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* from among them, he is taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; but his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* will I \w require|strong="H1875"\w* at the \w watchman’s|strong="H6822"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

¶ So thou, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; therefore thou shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* at my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* them from me.

When I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, O \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add*, thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; if thou dost not \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* from his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; but his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* will I \w require|strong="H1245"\w* at thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Nevertheless, if thou \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* of his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from it; if he do not \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; but thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Therefore, O thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Thus ye \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If our \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* and our \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \add be\add* upon us, and we pine \w away|strong="H4743"\w* in them, how should we then \w live|strong="H2421"\w*?

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, I have no \w pleasure|strong="H2654"\w* in the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*; but that the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye, \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye from your \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*; for why will ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

Therefore, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, The \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall not \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* him in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*: as for the \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, he shall not \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* thereby in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w turneth|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*; neither shall the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w live|strong="H2421"\w* for his \add righteousness\add* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w*.

When I shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \add that\add* he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; if he \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* to his own \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, all his \w righteousnesses|strong="H6666"\w* shall not be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*; but for his \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for it.

Again, when I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, Thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; if he \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*;\f + \fr 33.14 \ft that…: Heb. judgment and justice\f*

\add If\add* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* the \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w*, give \w again|strong="H7999"\w* that he had \w robbed|strong="H1500"\w*, \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, without \w committing|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*; he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, he shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

None of his \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H2398"\w* shall be \w mentioned|strong="H2142"\w* unto him: he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*; he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

¶ Yet the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* is not \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*: but as for them, their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* is not \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*.

When the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w turneth|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w committeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, he shall even \w die|strong="H4191"\w* thereby.

But if the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*, he shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* thereby.

¶ Yet ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* is not \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*. O ye \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* you every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* after his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of our \w captivity|strong="H1546"\w*, in the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* one that had \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w* out of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w city|strong="H5892"\w* is \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*.

Now the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was upon me in the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w afore|strong="H6440"\w* he that was \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*; and had \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, until he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to me in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; and my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* was \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, and I was no more \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w*.
Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, they that \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* those \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* was \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, and he \w inherited|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: but we \add are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*; the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us for \w inheritance|strong="H4181"\w*.

Wherefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* toward your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, and \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: and shall ye \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*?

Ye \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon your \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, ye \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*, and ye \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: and shall ye \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*?

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* thou thus unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, surely they that \add are\add* in the \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and him that \add is\add* in the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* to be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*, and they that \add be\add* in the \w forts|strong="H4679"\w* and in the \w caves|strong="H4631"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* of the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*.\f + \fr 33.27 \ft to be…: Heb. to devour him\f*

For I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w most|strong="H4923"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, and the \w pomp|strong="H1347"\w* of her \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* shall \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*; and the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, that none shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w*.\f + \fr 33.28 \ft most…: Heb. desolation and desolation\f*

Then shall they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I have \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w most|strong="H4923"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* because of all their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* which they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ Also, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* still are \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H0681"\w* thee by the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* and in the \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w one|strong="H2297"\w* to \w another|strong="H0259"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H0935"\w*, I pray you, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* what is the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 33.30 \ft against thee: of, of thee\f*

And they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee as the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w cometh|strong="H3996"\w*, and they \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee \add as\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, but they will not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them: for with their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* they \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* much \w love|strong="H5690"\w*, \add but\add* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*.\f + \fr 33.31 \ft as the…: Heb. according to the coming of the people\f*\f + \fr 33.31 \ft they sit…: or, my people sit before thee\f*\f + \fr 33.31 \ft they shew…: Heb. they make loves, or, jests\f*

And, lo, thou \add art\add* unto them as a very \w lovely|strong="H5690"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* of one that hath a \w pleasant|strong="H3303"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and can play \w well|strong="H2895"\w* on an \w instrument|strong="H5059"\w*: for they \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, but they \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them not.\f + \fr 33.32 \ft a very…: Heb. a song of loves\f*

And when this cometh to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, (lo, it will \w come|strong="H0935"\w*,) then shall they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* hath been \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.
